short_summary: This proposal is for high-end optical table provision with vibration isolated featuresADATA}
description: The National Research Council provides calibration services for frequency standards using the frequency comb technique. The primary objective of this procurement is to make sure NRC’s calibration services remain at the state-of-the-art by providinga high-end vibration-isolated optical table to support our new optical frequency comb system
duration_in_months: Efectively inlimited to two months after contract award
